system.description: This is a large shield featuring one to four short blades projecting from its sides, and it may also include a central spike for added offensive capability. Due to its size, this shield requires the use of both hands, preventing the wielder from using another weapon or shield simultaneously. Characters wielding this shield always lose individual initiative to opponents not using two-handed weapons. It is unsuitable for halflings and similarly small creatures such as goblins.
